![IncredibleVPS](https://order.incrediblevps.com/clients/templates/incrediblevps/img/logo.png)   

[IncredibleVPS](https://incrediblevps.com) is a brand, dedicated to offering high-performance, KVM based, virtual private servers with dedicated CPUs and high resources, all backed by our 24/7 support.  

**About us?**  
[IncredibleVPS](https://incrediblevps.com)  is part of DA International Group Ltd., which has been establish in 2013. We are a team of highly qualified IT specialists, with very broad knowedge in system administration, networking, Unix and Windows OS, backups and security. Our range of services include, but is not limited to - web hosting, reseller hosting, specific application hosting (wordpress, joomla node.js, etc.), OpenVZ and KVM based VPS, Dedicated servers, DDoS protection, R1Soft licenses, R1Soft managed backups, System administration and much more. All our OpenVZ services are utilizing only blazing fast, full SSD arrays, while our KVM services are using big HDD arrays to accomodate the needs of our customers.

**Our LET Offer:**  
  

**IncredibleVPS - 4G**  
- 1 Dedicated CPU core 
- 4GB Dedicated RAM (DDR3 ECC)  
- 50GB RAID10 HDD  
- 2TB Premium Bandwith  
- 1 Gbps Port  
- 1 IPv4 IP<br>
<strong>Optional DDOS Protection</strong><br>
**6.50 Euros per month**  
[ORDER NOW!](https://order.incrediblevps.com/clients/cart.php?systpl=incrediblevps&a=add&pid=104)  

_Current USD/EUR exchange rate: 1 euro = 0,93 US (6.50 euros = 6,99 USD)  

For bigger plans, please visit our website: [IncredibleVPS](https://incrediblevps.com)  


**Network information:**  
Location: Jacksonville, Florida, US
